entities.name: NodeId
entities.description: OPC UA NodeId — the unique identifier of a node in an OPC UA address space.

fields.name: identifierType
fields.description: NodeIdType: Numeric, String, Guid, or ByteString.

fields.name: namespace
fields.description: Namespace index (0 = OPC UA standard namespace).

fields.name: value
fields.description: Identifier value (numeric, string, guid, or base64).

entities.name: NodeClass
entities.description: OPC UA NodeClass enumeration. Values: Unspecified, Object, Variable, Method, ObjectType, VariableType, ReferenceType, DataType, View.

fields.name: value
fields.description: One of: Unspecified, Object, Variable, Method, ObjectType, VariableType, ReferenceType, DataType, View.

entities.name: DataValue
entities.description: OPC UA DataValue — the result of reading a variable node, including quality and timestamp.

fields.name: value
fields.description: The actual data wrapped in a Variant.

fields.name: statusCode
fields.description: OPC UA StatusCode indicating quality of the value.

fields.name: sourceTimestamp
fields.description: Timestamp when the value was sampled at the source.

fields.name: serverTimestamp
fields.description: Timestamp when the server processed the value.

fields.name: sourcePicoseconds
fields.description: Sub-millisecond precision for sourceTimestamp.

fields.name: serverPicoseconds
fields.description: Sub-millisecond precision for serverTimestamp.

entities.name: Variant
entities.description: OPC UA Variant — a polymorphic container for any OPC UA data type.

fields.name: dataType
fields.description: OPC UA DataType NodeId of the contained value.

fields.name: arrayType
fields.description: Scalar, Array, or Matrix.

fields.name: value
fields.description: The actual typed value (scalar or array).

fields.name: dimensions
fields.description: Array dimensions for matrix values.

entities.name: BrowseDescription
entities.description: OPC UA BrowseDescription — parameters for a Browse service call.

fields.name: nodeId
fields.description: Starting node for the browse operation.

fields.name: browseDirection
fields.description: Direction to browse: Forward, Inverse, Both, Invalid.

fields.name: referenceTypeId
fields.description: Filter by reference type NodeId.

fields.name: includeSubtypes
fields.description: Whether to include subtypes of referenceTypeId.

fields.name: nodeClassMask
fields.description: Bitmask of NodeClass values to include in results.

fields.name: resultMask
fields.description: Bitmask of result fields to return.

entities.name: BrowseResult
entities.description: OPC UA BrowseResult — the output of a Browse or BrowseNext call.

fields.name: statusCode
fields.description: Result status.

fields.name: continuationPoint
fields.description: Token for paging with BrowseNext; absent if complete.

fields.name: references
fields.description: Discovered references.

entities.name: ReadValueId
entities.description: OPC UA ReadValueId — identifies a node attribute to read.

fields.name: nodeId
fields.description: The node to read.

fields.name: attributeId
fields.description: OPC UA AttributeId (e.g., Value=13, BrowseName=3).

fields.name: indexRange
fields.description: NumericRange for reading array sub-ranges.

fields.name: dataEncoding
fields.description: Optional data encoding override.

entities.name: WriteValue
entities.description: OPC UA WriteValue — a single attribute write operation.

fields.name: nodeId
fields.description: The node to write.

fields.name: attributeId
fields.description: OPC UA AttributeId.

fields.name: indexRange
fields.description: NumericRange for partial array writes.

fields.name: value
fields.description: The new value with status and timestamps.

entities.name: MonitoredItemCreateRequest
entities.description: OPC UA MonitoredItemCreateRequest — subscribes to a node attribute for change notifications.

fields.name: itemToMonitor
fields.description: Node attribute to monitor.

fields.name: monitoringMode
fields.description: Disabled, Sampling, or Reporting.

fields.name: requestedParameters
fields.description: Sampling interval, queue size, filter.

entities.name: Subscription
entities.description: OPC UA Subscription — a server-side object that batches and publishes monitored item notifications.

fields.name: subscriptionId
fields.description: Server-assigned subscription identifier.

fields.name: publishingInterval
fields.description: Interval (ms) at which the server sends Publish responses.

fields.name: lifetimeCount
fields.description: Number of publish cycles before the subscription expires without a Publish.

fields.name: maxKeepAliveCount
fields.description: Maximum keep-alive cycles before sending a keep-alive response.

fields.name: maxNotificationsPerPublish
fields.description: Maximum notifications per Publish response.

fields.name: publishingEnabled
fields.description: Whether the subscription is actively publishing.

fields.name: priority
fields.description: Relative priority for concurrent subscriptions.

relationships.notes: DataValue wraps the actual typed value in a Variant.
Browse starts from a specific node.
Monitored items reference a specific node attribute to watch.
Monitored items are created within a subscription.

lifecycles.notes: OPC UA subscription lifecycle per Part 4 §5.13.1 state machine.

idempotency.notes: Read-only browse; repeatable without side effects.
Writes may have physical side effects; not idempotent.
Each call creates a new subscription with a new ID.
Creates new monitored items; duplicates are not merged.
OPC UA Method calls may have physical side effects.

events.name: dataChange.notification
events.notes: OPC UA Publish response streams DataChangeNotifications for subscribed variable nodes.

events.name: event.notification
events.notes: OPC UA event-type monitored items stream event notifications via Publish.

customFields.notes: OPC UA information model is extensible via custom DataTypes but requires server-side schema definition.
